00068         bool insert(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& value) {
00069 
00070                 char* ptr;
00071                 char* ptr1;
00072                 size_t ksize;
00073                 size_t vsize;
00074                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00075                 izene_serialization<ValueType> izs1(value);
00076                 izs.write_image(ptr, ksize);
00077                 izs1.write_image(ptr1, vsize);
00078 
00079                 return tchdbputkeep(hdb_, ptr, ksize, ptr1, vsize);
00080         }

00086         ValueType* find(const KeyType & key) {
00087                 char* ptr;
00088                 size_t ksize;
00089                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00090                 izs.write_image(ptr, ksize);
00091 
00092                 int sp;
00093                 void* value = tchdbget(hdb_, ptr, ksize, &sp);
00094                 if( !value )return NULL;
00095                 else {
00096                         ValueType *val = new ValueType;
00097                         izene_deserialization<ValueType> izd((char*)value, (size_t)sp);
00098                         izd.read_image(*val);
00099                         free(value);
00100                         return val;
00101                 }
00102         }

00105         {
00106 
00107                 char* ptr;
00108                 size_t ksize;
00109                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00110                 izs.write_image(ptr, ksize);
00111 
00112                 int sp;
00113                 void* pv = tchdbget(hdb_, ptr, ksize, &sp);
00114                 if( !pv )return false;
00115                 else {
00116                         izene_deserialization<ValueType> izd((char*)pv, (size_t)sp);
00117                         izd.read_image(value);
00118                         free(pv);
00119                         return true;
00120                 }
00121         }

00226         bool seq(SDBCursor& locn, DataType& rec, ESeqDirection sdir=ESD_FORWARD) {
00227                                 
00228                 char* ptr;
00229                 size_t ksize;
00230                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(locn);
00231                 izs.write_image(ptr, ksize);            
00232                 
00233                 ValueType* pv;
00234                 pv = find(locn);
00235                 if( pv )
00236                 {
00237                         rec.key = locn;
00238                         rec.value = *pv;
00239                 }
00240                 else
00241                 {
00242                         ptr = NULL;
00243                 }
00244                 int sp;
00245                 void *buf;
00246                 buf = tchdbgetnext(hdb_, ptr, ksize, &sp);
00247                 if(buf != NULL)
00248                 {                       
00249                         izene_deserialization<KeyType> izd((char*)buf, (size_t)sp);
00250                         izd.read_image(locn);
00251                         return true;
00252                 }
00253                 return false;
00254         }
